product_overview: Meu Agente is a micro SaaS platform offering AI-driven agents interacting via WhatsApp to automate customer service, operations, and business processes, aiming to reduce operational costs, increase conversion rates, and standardize workflows.
core_goals: Enable 24/7 AI-powered customer service within WhatsApp Business policies.
Provide financial management including income/expense tracking with export capabilities.
Offer specialized AI sub-agents like SDR, Marketing, Appointment Scheduling, Development, and Video agents, varying by plan.
Support web search and data extraction only from permitted sources adhering to privacy and legal regulations.
Deliver multi-tier subscription plans with varying levels of automation, support, and features including dedicated WhatsApp numbers in paid plans.
Ensure security, privacy and regulatory compliance including LGPD, consent management and data backups.
Facilitate integrations with Google Workspace services and WhatsApp Business API.
Offer advanced analytics, dashboards and reporting tools for sales, marketing, and operations.
Maintain an intuitive user experience for interaction primarily via WhatsApp and a complementary web app.
key_features: Complete authentication and session management leveraging Supabase Auth with phone-based login and rate limiting.
Financial agent enabling entry/exit records management with categories, filters, and CSV/PDF export (in paid tiers).
Task management system with priorities, due dates, and status tracking integrated into workflows.
Goal setting and progress tracking with visual indicators.
Calendar and agenda management supporting multiple views, event creation and reminders, integrating with Google Calendar optionally.
Comprehensive dashboard and analytics showing financial metrics and real-time charts.
Real-time notifications system with user management interface.
Multi-modal search and filtering across modules for efficient data retrieval.
Support system including FAQ, ticket creation and priority handling for Business and Premium plans.
Subscription and plan management system with enforced feature restrictions and upgrade workflows.
Data backup and privacy management with LGPD compliance and off-site backups for Premium.
Dark/light theme support and responsive modern UI based on React, Tailwind and Shadcn/UI.
Data visualization components using Recharts for financial insights.
Reusable utility components to maintain UI consistency and responsiveness.
user_flow_summary: User authentication via phone OTP using Supabase Auth.
Manual or automated interaction with AI sub-agents through WhatsApp messaging for different functions such as finance, scheduling, marketing and development support.
Financial record management via app interface or WhatsApp commands with export options available in paid plans.
Scheduling and appointment creation linked optionally with Google Calendar and Drive, with automated reminders.
Lead qualification and meeting scheduling via SDR agent with humanized messaging flows.
Video content generation requests processed through Google Veo 3 (for Business and Premium plans).
Support ticket creation and management through web app interface (Business/Premium only).
Plan selection and upgrade managed via web app with feature restriction enforcement.
Backup scheduling and privacy settings management primarily for Premium plan users.
Real-time notifications accessible through app UI with dropdown bell icon.
validation_criteria: Authentication system must reliably support phone login with proper rate limiting and session management.
Financial data exports reflect accurate filtered data in CSV or PDF format as requested.
AI sub-agent features respond to WhatsApp inputs appropriately according to the subscribed plan capabilities.
Automations via WhatsApp are inactive in Free and Basic plans but fully operational in Business and Premium plans.
Google Workspace integrations function correctly and securely where enabled.
Support tickets are created, tracked and resolved in Business and Premium plans.
User interface respects theme settings, is responsive, and accessible on web and mobile devices.
Backup procedures for Premium plan are executed daily and validated for integrity.
Data privacy and LGPD compliance mandate user consent, opt-out handling, and secure data management.
Plan restrictions are correctly enforced, and upgrades unlock additional features per documented matrix.
